original_text: For seven days eat bread made without yeast and on the seventh day hold a festival to the Lord.
korean_text: 이레 동안 무교병을 먹고 일곱째 날에는 여호와께 절기를 지키라

sentences.original_text: For seven days eat bread made without yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안 누룩 없는 빵을 먹으라

sentences.original_text: hold a festival to the Lord
